body_html:
I am getting the same error with tf1,3 on raspberry pi3
I did following

export HOST_NSYNC_LIB=tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh
export TARGET_NSYNC_LIB="$HOST_NSYNC_LIB"
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" CXX=g++-4.8

sudo cp /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync* /usr/include/.
make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile
======== Now I start to get error-----

subprocess.cc:(.text+0xcd4): undefined reference to `nsync::nsync_mu_unlock(nsync::nsync_mu_s_*)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

How do I address this error. I have tried all most all idea suggested on web .
I am running Jessie version 8 .

body:
I am getting the same error with tf1,3 on raspberry pi3
I did following 
----------------------
export HOST_NSYNC_LIB=`tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh`
export TARGET_NSYNC_LIB="$HOST_NSYNC_LIB"
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI  OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" CXX=g++-4.8

sudo cp /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync* /usr/include/.
make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile
======== Now I start to get error-----

subprocess.cc:(.text+0xcd4): undefined reference to `nsync::nsync_mu_unlock(nsync::nsync_mu_s_*)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

----------------------------

How do I address this error. I have tried all most all idea suggested on web .
I am running Jessie version 8 .
